description: Modern 1 Bedroom apartment in the Upper West Side across Central Park a step down to the bus station and two blocks from the subway.
name: Central Park West entire 1 bedroom apartment
review: Kiros is very friendly and makes a big effort to please and make your stay pleasant.  He had fruit, cookies, water, sodas.  He also had plenty extra bed sheets and comforters.  It is a bit outdated but comfortable.
